subj-group.subject: Forum on Remembering the Past: Memory, History, Commemoration

title-group.article-title: Narrative and the Start of the Northern Irish Troubles: Ireland's Revolutionary Tradition in Comparative Perspective

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2011 The North American Conference on British Studies
